Desert

This is somewhat ``mysterious'' and mildly ``Eastern'' sounding. Written for the Duke Ellington hit ``Caravan''.

  • Desert
  • DesertSus
  • DesertFill
  • DesertEnd

Desert

Pretty funky beat for the desert. (4)
